column4: hey all, I was trying to help my cousin setup a split boot on his Dell Dimension. I read some horror stories last night about the DELL partition. Anyone have good links or advice before I proceed?
may be a VERY good idea to track down a 2nd hd for him to install and boot from.
ivx: I once hacked out the ntldr to do a split boot without grub. That might be another option. I wonder does 6.10 allow you to install without grub?
i just use a 2nd hd.. and use the bios boot options to boot that hd.. that way windows never gets touched at all.
